title: Patching issue
body: The game tells me there is a server issue that prevents me from installing the latest patch. I added a screenshot to this threat. As a result, I cannot play at all atm.

replies.body:
Found this post https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/X6V5Znfk-error-code-003-13th-june-2018
See if any of those steps help
Still no working. Well, at least my appartment is pretty clean now ;)
Restarted program rub as adim same issue
Im having the same issue. Anyone know how to fix? Extremely frustrating
I have **the same** problem, I restarted my pc, my client, nothing helps.
